snippet: A company in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, falsely marketed beef to Muslims around the world for years as meeting strict halal standards for slaughtering animals, federal prosecutors allege in a fraud indictment.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Midamar Corp in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, with falsely marketing beef to Muslims as meeting strict halal standards for slaughtering animals.
lead_paragraph: A company in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, falsely marketed beef to Muslims around the world for years as meeting strict halal standards for slaughtering animals, federal prosecutors allege in a fraud indictment.

headline.main: Iowa: Halal Beef Supplier Is Charged With Fraud
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Halal Beef Supplier Is Charged With Fraud
